VM multi-omics UTEC2

Adresses IP : 172.17.6.3 IP Publique :134.158.246.91

Infrastructure : OpenStack CC

Image de base : CentOS7

Rôle de déployement Ansible : server, rnaseq

Tenant Open Stack : htc-bioaster

Point de montage GPFS : /mnt/gpfs

Serveur NFS : ccdtli94

Flavor : htc.bioaster.2 (16 VCPUs,Root Disk 40 GB, Ephemeral Disk 300 GB, RAM 128 GB)

Ephemeral : Monté sur /scratch

Configuration du rôle : 

---

nfs_mount_port: 664
nfs_server: ccdtli94
gpfs_path: /sps/bioaster
nfs_dest_path: /mnt/bioaster

yum_update_option: security
updater_email: "{{ inventory_hostname }}@bioaster.org"
admin_email: admin@bioaster.org
smtp_server: localhost

system_groups:
  - { name: bioaster, gid: 1072 }

# Only to add those key to ansible_ssh_user
admins:
  - pveyre
  - cauchard
